title: Saturday Night Special
description: What do you get when you cross a gold-digging stripper, a down-on-her-luck hooker, an estranged husband, his knocked-up wife, a Wayne Newton look-alike taxi driver and one beleaguered Baltimore cop? A typical night in the life of Riley Collins—Vegas style.Once again, it’s Aaron Young to the rescue. Aaron’s been watching Riley’s ass forever—and he’s wanted to spank it for even longer. Now, he’s finally gets his wish—after he drags a drunken Riley to a chapel and makes it legit, of course.Saturday Night Special is the sixth book in New York Times bestselling author Mari Carr’s Wild Irish series.
author: Mari Carr
